title: Clippy ICE on simple struct

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```Rust
struct TraitVec<T: ?Sized> {
    inner: Vec<Box<T>>,
}

fn main() {}
```

ICE's when running `cargo clippy`, on both 2015 and 2018, stable, beta and nightly.

https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2015&gist=951ddcb6529dcb2a4e7949f3205f6d7e

<details>
